targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN labels->>'result' = 'hit' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) /
    NULLIF(SUM(metric_value), 0), 2) as hit_rate_percent
FROM monitoring.metrics
WHERE metric_name IN ('cache_hits_total', 'cache_misses_total')
  AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
  AND environment = '$environment';

SELECT
  date_trunc('minute', timestamp) as time,
  SUM(metric_value) as cache_hits
FROM monitoring.metrics
WHERE metric_name = 'cache_hits_total'
  AND timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
  AND timestamp <= $__timeTo()
  AND environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  date_trunc('minute', timestamp) as time,
  SUM(metric_value) as cache_misses
FROM monitoring.metrics
WHERE metric_name = 'cache_misses_total'
  AND timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
  AND timestamp <= $__timeTo()
  AND environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

WITH cache_stats AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('minute', timestamp) as time,
    labels->>'cache_type' as cache_type,
    SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'cache_hits_total' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) as hits,
    SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'cache_misses_total' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) as misses
  FROM monitoring.metrics
  WHERE metric_name IN ('cache_hits_total', 'cache_misses_total')
    AND timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
    AND timestamp <= $__timeTo()
    AND environment = '$environment'
  GROUP BY time, cache_type
)
SELECT
  time,
  cache_type,
  ROUND(100.0 * hits / NULLIF(hits + misses, 0), 2) as hit_rate_percent
FROM cache_stats
WHERE hits + misses > 0
ORDER BY time;

WITH cache_stats AS (
  SELECT
    labels->>'cache_type' as cache_type,
    SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'cache_hits_total' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) as total_hits,
    SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'cache_misses_total' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) as total_misses
  FROM monitoring.metrics
  WHERE metric_name IN ('cache_hits_total', 'cache_misses_total')
    AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
    AND environment = '$environment'
  GROUP BY cache_type
)
SELECT
  COALESCE(cache_type, 'query_cache') as cache_type,
  total_hits,
  total_misses,
  total_hits + total_misses as total_requests,
  ROUND(100.0 * total_hits / NULLIF(total_hits + total_misses, 0), 2) as hit_rate_percent,
  ROUND(total_hits::numeric / NULLIF(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM INTERVAL '$time_range') / 60, 0), 2) as hits_per_minute
FROM cache_stats
WHERE total_hits + total_misses > 0
ORDER BY hit_rate_percent DESC;

panels.title: Cache Savings (Time Saved)

targets.rawSql:
WITH cache_hits AS (
  SELECT SUM(metric_value) as total_hits
  FROM monitoring.metrics
  WHERE metric_name = 'cache_hits_total'
    AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
    AND environment = '$environment'
)
SELECT
  total_hits,
  ROUND((total_hits * 50)::numeric, 0) as time_saved_ms,
  ROUND((total_hits * 50 / 1000.0)::numeric, 2) as time_saved_seconds
FROM cache_hits;

panels.description: Estimated time saved by cache hits (assuming ~50ms per database query)

targets.rawSql:
WITH cache_ops AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('minute', timestamp) as time,
    SUM(metric_value) as operations
  FROM monitoring.metrics
  WHERE metric_name IN ('cache_hits_total', 'cache_misses_total')
    AND timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
    AND timestamp <= $__timeTo()
    AND environment = '$environment'
  GROUP BY time
)
SELECT
  time,
  operations / 60.0 as ops_per_second
FROM cache_ops
ORDER BY time;

WITH cache_stats AS (
  SELECT
    labels->>'cache_type' as cache_type,
    SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'cache_hits_total' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) as hits
  FROM monitoring.metrics
  WHERE metric_name = 'cache_hits_total'
    AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
    AND environment = '$environment'
  GROUP BY cache_type
)
SELECT
  COALESCE(cache_type, 'query_cache') as cache_type,
  hits
FROM cache_stats
WHERE hits > 0
ORDER BY hits DESC;
